title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
description: When attempting to set the output location and classpath in the project settings, an error message is displayed and the operation fails. This occurs when both settings are not performed as a single operation.
OB: After pressing OK, the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src' is displayed. This error occurs because the act of setting the output location and classpath are performed separately, resulting in an illegal state.
SR:
1. Open the project settings.
2. Navigate to the classpath configuration.
3. Set the output location and classpath in a single operation.
4. Press OK to save the changes.
